data.author: Adrián Pérez

changelog.release_notes: This release adds a nifty battery bar and, most importantly, support for Pebble Time Round (“Chalk” platform).
Watchface is now configurable, and two new fonts for the beats display can now be selected.
Fixed calculations for UTC timezone offset and Internet Time. Now the @beats time value should be correct for all timezones.

Normal time display (HH:MM) uses now a slightly larger font, and respects 24h/12h setting. The beats display has now a custom font. Bluetooth status is now tracked, and a short vibration produced on disconnect events.

- Fixed calculation of @beats time.
- Added small display the time in usual HH:MM format (24h format only for now, no AM/PM).
- On Basalt (Pebble Time), the HH:MM text display has light gray color.
- Changed to black background.

data.description: Simple watchface which just shows the @beats Swatch Internet Time, alongside a traditional HH:MM display and a battery meter. The traditional display respects the 24h/12h time format setting. Vibrates on Bluetooth disconnect. Beats display font is configurable.

latest_release.release_notes: This release adds a nifty battery bar and, most importantly, support for Pebble Time Round (“Chalk” platform).

data.title: @beats
